en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Beijing

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will visit Beijing from September 13 to 15..
In Beijing, Ms Cheng will attend the annual working meeting with the Department of Treaty and Law of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. She will also meet with officials of the Supreme People's Court.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong on September 15.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師將於九月十三日至十五日訪問北京。
在北京期間，鄭若驊將出席與外交部條約法律司的周年工作會議，以及與最高人民法院官員會面。
鄭若驊將於九月十五日返回香港。

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will visit Beijing from September 13 to 15..
In Beijing, Ms Cheng will attend the annual working meeting with the Department of Treaty and Law of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
She will also meet with officials of the Supreme People's Court.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong on September 15.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師將於九月十三日至十五日訪問北京
在北京期間，鄭若驊將出席與外交部條約法律司的周年工作會議，以及與最高人民法院官員會面
